title: Sunday Shows preview: Gang rule throws Haiti into turmoil; 2024 election heats up

title: Trump rallies voters in Ohio ahead of Senate GOP primary: Watch live
description: Former President Trump is set to speak in Dayton, Ohio, Saturday, at the Buckeye Values PAC Rally, backing GOP Ohio Senate Candidate Bernie Moreno in his primary race. title: Biden to give remarks at annual Gridiron Club dinner: What to know
description: President Biden is slated to give remarks at the annual Gridiron Club dinner, one of the most high-profile Washington media events. The roast will take place on Saturday night as Washington’s oldest association of journalists looks to continue traditions and its 130-year-plus history.  What is it? title: FTC probing Reddit plan to let AI firms use user-generated content to train software
description: The Federal Trade Commission (FTC) is probing Reddit’s plan to let artificial intelligence (AI) firms utilize user-generated content to train their software, according to the social media company’s Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filing Friday.  The inquiry comes just days before Reddit is slated to complete its initial public offering, after filing for it last…

title: First ship carrying food aid arrives in Gaza, ‘preparations underway’ to dispatch second
description: The first ship carrying 200 tons of food gathered by World Central Kitchen (WCK) arrived in Gaza Friday and, the organization announced, more will be coming soon. WCK, the charity founded by celebrity chef José Andrés, released a statement that its team unloaded the aid in Gaza. The food was carried on a ship by…

title: Both parties are returning to their roots on Social Security
description: President Biden’s budget shows that he is the heir to Franklin D. Roosevelt, while Trump’s CNBC comments show that he is the heir to Alf Landon. Americans should vote accordingly this November.

title: Biden’s new energy rules must stop an existential climate threat: Donald Trump
description: Revising rules regarding electric vehicle options is by far the most important climate and energy electoral issue Biden faces, one that could tip the election in a razor-close outcome of just a few thousand votes in just a few key states.

title: Shelter in place ordered for Pennsylvania community after reports of ‘several’ gunshot victims
description: A shelter-in-place was ordered Saturday morning in a Pennsylvania township after multiple people were shot, according to local police.  Middletown Township Police Department said there are “several” gunshot victims in Falls Township, per its Facebook post.  “There are several gun shot victims and it is unknown at this time if they are targeted or random,…

title: Charles Barkley spoke up for millions of abandoned Americans — and no one cared
description: Millions of our fellow citizens in our inner cities are unseen, unheard and forgotten by the elites in our government.

title: The Supreme Court should reject attempts by Florida, Texas to control social media platforms
description: The states’ overreach violates not only the First Amendment rights of the platforms but also the Supremacy Clause of the Constitution.

title: From Georgia to New York, 2024 could turn on the odor of selective prosecution
description: The removal of lead special prosecutor Nathan Wade from Donald Trump's prosecution had the feel of a Southern Gothic.

title: Zelensky vows ‘just response’ to latest Russian missile strike on Odesa
description: Ukraine’s President Volodymyr Zelensky vowed his nation would serve Russia a “just response” in retaliation for the latest Russian missile strike on Odesa that left at least 20 dead Friday.  Russia attacked the Black Sea port city with ballistic missiles that killed at least 20 people and injured at least 70. title: The ascent of SpaceX’s Starship is a testament to American ingenuity and perseverance
description: Starship's maiden voyage may be over, but its legacy has only just begun. It is a powerful reminder that, even in an era of division and uncertainty, the American spirit of innovation, exploration, and perseverance burns as brightly as ever.

title: We need to take our post-pandemic mental health crisis seriously
description: We are a nation in psychological turmoil.

title: Funding cuts are pushing our national parks to the breaking point
description: Time is running out to truly protect our national parks and public lands for future generations.

title: US budget fights threaten Haiti security mission

title: Democratic anger over Israel reaches new heights

title: Democrats in survival mode rebuilding Biden’s 2020 coalition
description: Democrats are in survival mode in trying to rebuild the coalition that helped President Biden win the White House in 2020, working to bring critical voters back to the fold at this point rather than substantially trying to grow the base. title: 5 sticking points in the fight to avert a shutdown
description: Lawmakers are racing to reach an agreement on the final six full-year government funding bills, but they face a list of hurdles as they barrel toward a shutdown deadline Friday. title: Newsom postpones State of the State address
description: California Gov. title: United Airlines Boeing plane lands without external panel
description: An external panel was found to be missing from a Boeing United Airlines flight after it landed in southern Oregon on Friday. United Flight 433, which departed from San Francisco at 10:20 a.m., landed in Medford, Ore., just before noon. The external panel was determined to be missing from the underside of the Boeing 737-800…

title: Ken Buck slams ‘ridiculous’ claims he’s resigning to hurt Boebert’s election chances
description: Rep. Ken Buck (R-Colo.) slammed the claims that he’s resigning from Congress to hinder Rep. Lauren Boebert’s (R-Colo.) chances of claiming his 4th Congressional District seat.  Buck initially announced last year that he would not be running for reelection. title: Sheriff had cause to take Maine shooter into protective custody: report
description: The commission reviewing the events that led up to October’s Maine mass shooting found that local law enforcement could have taken the shooter into custody and seized his weapons prior to the shooting. Army reservist Robert Card murdered 18 people in Lewiston, Maine, on Oct. 25, marking the deadliest mass shooting in the state’s history.…
